mapper.sql: id, name, no, contract_no, company_name, group_name, contract_sign_date, start_date, end_date, months, total_price, manager, general_manager, province, city, status, date_insert, date_update, delete_mark
mapper.select:
SELECT p.id AS id,p.name AS name,p.no AS no,p.contract_no AS contractNo,p.company_name AS companyName, p.group_name AS groupName,DATE_FORMAT(p.contract_sign_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS contractSignDate, DATE_FORMAT(p.start_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS startDate,DATE_FORMAT(p.end_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS endDate, p.months AS months, CAST(CONVERT(p.total_price,DECIMAL(15,2)) AS CHAR) AS totalPrice,p.general_manager AS generalManager,p.manager AS manager, CASE p.status WHEN 1 THEN '待进场' WHEN 2 THEN '施工中' WHEN 3 THEN '停工中' WHEN 4 THEN '已完成' END AS status FROM project p WHERE delete_mark = 0
AND p.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{params.projectName},'%')
ORDER BY p.date_insert DESC

SELECT p.id AS id,p.name AS name,p.no AS no,p.contract_no AS contractNo,p.company_name AS companyName, p.group_name AS groupName,DATE_FORMAT(p.contract_sign_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS contractSignDate, DATE_FORMAT(p.start_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS startDate,DATE_FORMAT(p.end_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS endDate, p.months AS months, CAST(CONVERT(p.total_price,DECIMAL(15,2)) AS CHAR) AS totalPrice,p.general_manager AS generalManager,p.manager AS manager, p.province,p.city,p.status FROM project p WHERE delete_mark = 0 AND p.id = #{id}
